actions.committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on District of Columbia.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on District of Columbia
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Operations and Metropolitan Affairs.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Operations and Metropolitan Affairs

official_title: Supporting the initiative of the National Capital Planning Commission in the preparation of a new visionary plan to guide the future development of the central Federal Monumental Core area of the Nation's Capital.

summary.text: Declares that the Congress supports the National Capital Planning Commission in undertaking the creation of such a visionary plan in its unique role as the central Federal planning agency in the National Capital.

titles.title: Supporting the initiative of the National Capital Planning Commission in the preparation of a new visionary plan to guide the future development of the central Federal Monumental Core area of the Nation's Capital.
